# TODO
# - get rid of *.lib, *.dll to ensure multi-platform
# - get proto's generated by make process
# - link against debug or release based on build parameters

include_directories (${PROTOBUF_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories (${PROTOBUF_LIBRARY})
add_library (libprotobuf.lib STATIC IMPORTED)

include_directories (${ZMQ_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories (${ZMQ_LIBRARY})
add_library (libzmq.dll SHARED IMPORTED)

add_executable (uRPC juststart.cpp uRPC.pb.cc Log.pb.cc)
target_link_libraries (uRPC libprotobuf)
target_link_libraries (uRPC libzmq)
